message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor, as I have the advantage of being the first proposer.
Let's be a little more equitable.  I propose a 55/45 split in my favor, recognizing the advantage of going first.  I hope we can reach a fair agreement quickly.
Let's split it down the middle.  I think we can both agree that a 50/50 split is the fairest way to divide the money at this point.
